question: Which two countries are native to the vulnerable bird species "La Selle thrush"?
explanation: The Dominican Republic and Haiti are the two countries that are native to the vulnerable bird species "La Selle thrush". The La Selle thrush is a species of bird in the family Turdidae native to Hispaniola (the Dominican Republic and Haiti). A skulker of broadleaf and pine forests around 1300m, it is limited to a small and declining population in the inland Dominican Republic, as well as a relict population in Haiti.
